```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
source('conn.R')
```

```{r}
fullTime <- tbl(conStudent, 'fulltime')
fullTimeTibble <- collect(fullTime)

avgSalary <- mean(fullTimeTibble$salary, na.rm = T)
boxStats <- boxplot.stats(fullTimeTibble$salary)
quantiles <- boxStats$stats
names(quantiles) <- c("low", "Q1", "Q2", "Q3", "high")
```

```{r}
fullTimeTibble %>% 
  mutate(salaryBracket = case_when(
    salary > quantiles['Q3'] ~ "high",
    salary < quantiles['Q1'] ~ "low",
    TRUE ~ "medium"
  )) -> fullTimeTibble
```
